attributes.action: The Independent "Gang of 7" must call By-Elections in their constituencies
attributes.additional_details:
All 7 of them must go back to their people to seek their approval, it's call democracy.
Please help support democracy by supporting this petition
attributes.background: Since the "Gang of 7" have left the party that they were elected on, they should have to face By-Elections to see if they constituencies still want them to represent their area.
